text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes @SecAzar Trump doesn't seem to like testing, as it would reveal more COVID-19 deaths under his watch.  Did U know that deaths at home, including nursing facilities, are not recorded by the fed. gov.?  Per NBC News, there have been more than 2,200 deaths just in nursing homes alone so far.
